==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|土|曜}}

===Etymology===
/doeu/ > /doyoː/. Originally it meant the planet Saturn<ref name="Amoghavajra" />. A [[calque]] of {{cog|la|dies Saturni}} and its descendants. Compare {{m|ja|土星|tr=dosei|gloss=Saturn (planet)}}.

===Pronunciation===
* {{IPA|/dojoː/|lang=ja}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|どよう|hhira=どえう}}

# {{lb|ja|archaic}} planet [[Saturn]]
# [[Saturday]]

====Synonyms====
* {{l|ja|土曜日}} (doyōbi)

===See also===
* {{l|ja|七曜}} (shichiyō)
